column1: Got any needles on you? Any crack pipes?
Then why is there a meth lab in your backyard?
When will you people learn to lay off the Pabst Blue Ribbon? Now look at the camera and say "I'm white trash and I'm in trouble."
Wait, wasn't that Peterson in there?
Sir! You'd better see this!  There's something new trending! #copscantgoaroundchokingblackpeople.
Maybe his powers have left him.
